title: Music genres preferred by consumers in the U.S. 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 15 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Rock and lowest at Response Other.
The highest Response Rock has 47.5 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Other.
min_summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
Response Rock has the highest Share of respondents and Other has the lowest Share of respondents.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 15 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Rock and lowest at Response Other.
The highest Response Rock has 47.5 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Other.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 15 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Rock and lowest at Response Other.
Second maximum Share of respondents is found at Response Pop.
There is a difference of 47.5 between the maximum Response Rock and minimum Response Other.
Share of respondents at Response Rock is 56.8 , second place is Pop at 56.1, and thirdly is Country at 49.9.
The highest value 56.8 at Rock is almost 2.04 times larger than the average value 27.83.
